title: Unnale Lyrics Darling Song Lyrics
stanzas:
UnnaleÂ Kangal Thallaadi Lyrics From Darling Tamil Movie
Singer(s): Shankar Mahadevan, Shreya Ghosal

Unnaale
kangal thallaadi
urangaamal
yaengum en aavi.

Neeraaviyaai
ennai nee modhinaai.
Un paarvayil
eeram unndaakkinaai.

Nee thoda thoda
naanum poovaai malarndhaen.
Naan en penmayil
vaasam unarndhaen.

Nee arugil vara vara
aaval arindhaen.
Naan en aanmayil
paavam thurandhaen.

Munjenmam ellaam
poi endru ninaithaen.
un kannai
paarthaen meithaanada.

uruvangal ellaam
udal vittu pogum.
ullathil kadhal saagaadhadi.

Unnaale
kangal thallaadi
urangaamal
yaengum en aavi.

Yedho ondrai
unnil kandaen.
Eriyum theeyai
ennai kandaen.

Uyirin uyiraai
unnai kandaen.
ennai alli
un kayyil thandhaen.

Kadhal kondu kangal kenja
adi kai meeri uyirodudhey.

Unnaale
kangal thallaadi
urangaamal
yaengum en aavi.

Muludhaai nilavu
nammai paarkka.
kattril engum
adhu maayam serkka.

Kaigal korththu serthu
nee vetkam serkka.
Vetkam thaandi
naan ennai thorkka.

Maranam thaandi
vazhum kadhal.
un vhzhiyoram
naan kaangiren.

Unnaale
kangal thallaadi
urangaamal
yaengum en aavi.

Neeraaviyaai
ennai nee modhinaai.
Un paarvayil
eeram unndaakkinaai.

Nee thoda thoda
naanum poovaai malarndhaen.
Naan en penmayil
vaasam unarndhaen.

Nee arugil vara vara
aaval arindhaen.
Naan en aanmayil
paavam thurandhaen.

Munjenmam ellaam
poi endru ninaithaen.
un kannai
paarthaen meithaanada.

uruvangal ellaam
udal vittu pogum.
ullathil kadhal saagaadhadi.
